content: Enable this option to allow invitations to be sent to new {{productName}} members through the {{sectionName}} section. Disable this option in case you want to invite new members through LDAP only.

comment.text: This translation key is used to describe a checkbox option that enables or disables invitations to new users through the contacts section of a portal settings page. It appears in a dialog or settings panel and helps explain the purpose of sending invitation notifications to new members.
